inspirationalQuotes.name: - Dr. Seuss
inspirationalQuotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.

inspirationalQuotes.name: - Oscar Wilde
inspirationalQuotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

inspirationalQuotes.name: - Mae West
inspirationalQuotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

inspirationalQuotes.name: - Mahatma Gandhi
inspirationalQuotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

inspirationalQuotes.name: - J. K. Rowling
inspirationalQuotes.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

inspirationalQuotes.name: - Albert Einstein
inspirationalQuotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
